body:
@Michael Yumizuri Lmao are you a Slut yourself or more like a cuck? I dont think many people here have problems with experienced women but its obvious that in romance focused mangas/doujins/hentais the people want more love and not just sex or a slut that acts like this gyaru here.

Even though this is vanilla that behaviour of her is off-putting & she didnt even react when he called her a slut outright in her face. Also not a single time did any of them say that they love each other, its just overall a shitty story with shitty characters.

Mc is the personification of people in the comment section, they unconsciously think that only virgins are cute, their heart sinks when they see the girl is not a virgin, but will actually jump out in joy if she is. (Don't be a hypocrite, be an retard)
Mc pisses me off for some reason, in his mind only virgins are cute, treated her like nothing till he realized she was a virgin, she's his childhood friend for crying out loud
She gonna keep on pouncing him until she gets that baby.
The MC in this is so stupid it's annoying
This was nice for a change. A pure-type Gyaru was interesting to see. :]
So pure, reminds me of my days back when I was addicted to crack. Good times, good times.
Childhood friend vanilla is the best thing on this world.

@dsfargeg dark skin and gyaru are not "womanly features" and as for the boob part he could mean the art style or larger boobs. Besides, he also might just not be into tits of any shape or size and be an ass/leg man or something.

The real question is, if he dislikes tanned gyaru, why did he read a manga where both the thumbnail, first page, and tags clearly suggest he'll have a bad time. Those are the ones that have no right to complain.
lol if you're disgusted by womanly features might as well kill yourself now because you will never be loved and die alone an incel to the end
I dislike tans, Gyarus and those disgusting boobs... Yet, the emotional part of this was alright =-=
A Gyaru who kept a childhood promise and remained a virgin for the guy she loves... delicious choco-vanilla!
